subject: Soccer
Tests (Drug Use)
Meat
Gold Cup (Soccer)
lead_paragraph: The Americans can still advance past the Gold Cup group stage with a win on Tuesday against Guadeloupe despite suffering their first-ever loss to the Panamanians, 2-1.
snippet: The Americans can still advance past the Gold Cup group stage with a win on Tuesday against Guadeloupe despite suffering their first-ever loss to the Panamanians, 2-1.
